  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>3854</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Tangram</string>
            <string language="en">Tangram</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tangram</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tangram</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tangram</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τανγκράμ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tangram</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Tangram è un antico puzzle cinese con 7 parti, 1 quadrato, 5 triangoli e un parallelogramma. Seleziona una figura e prova a coprire la parte grigia.</string>
            <string language="en">Tangram is an ancient Chinese puzzle with 7 pieces, 1 square, 5 triangles and a parallelogram. Select a figure and try to cover the grey field.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">tangram</string>
            <string language="en">tangram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">puzzle</string>
            <string language="en">puzzle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tangram ist ein altes chinesisches Puzzlespiel 
mit 7 Stücken, 1 Quadrat, 5 Dreiecken und einem Parallelogramm. 
Wählen Sie eine Abbildung aus und versuchen Sie, das Grau zu 
umfassen auffangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tangram est un puzzle chinois antique avec 7 
morceaux, 1 place, 5 triangles et un parallélogramme. 
Choisissez une figure et essayez de couvrir la zone grise.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tangram é um enigma chinês antigo com 7 partes,
1 quadrado, 5 triângulos e um paralelogramo. Selecione uma 
figura e tente-a cobrir o campo cinzento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το τανγκράμ είναι ένας αρχαίος κινεζικός γρίφος με 7
κομμάτια, 1 τετράγωνο, 5 τρίγωνα και ένα παραλληλόγραμμο. 
Επιλέξτε έναν αριθμό και προσπαθήστε να καλύψετε το γκρίζο
πεδίο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tangram es un rompecabezas chino antiguo con 7 
pedazos, 1 cuadrado, 5 triángulos y un paralelogramo. 
Seleccione una figura e intente cubrir el campo gris.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">tangram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Puzzlespiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tangram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">puzzle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tangram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">enigma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τανγκράμ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γρίφος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tangram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rompecabezas</string>
          </keyword>
